SELECT SSN, Email, Rating, CreditCardNumber, LastName, FirstName,Address, ZipCode, Telephone FROM Customer INNER JOIN Person ON Customer.Id=Person.SSN WHERE Customer.Id = #{SSN}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Customer(FirstName, LastName, Address, ZipCode, Telephone,Rating, Id, Email, CreditCardNumber) VALUES(#{person.firstName}, #{person.lastName}, #{person.Address}, #{person.zipCode}, #{person.telephone}, #{customer.rating}, #{customer.id}, #{customer.email}, #{customer.creditCardNumber});
mapper.select: SELECT Person.FirstName FROM Person INNER JOIN Account ON Person.SSN = Account.Customer INNER JOIN Rental ON Account.Id= Rental.AccountId GROUP BY FirstName ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 2;

SELECT Movie.Name FROM Customer LEFT JOIN Account ON Customer.Id = Account.Customer LEFT JOIN Rental ON Account.Id= Rental.AccountId LEFT JOIN Movie ON Rental.MovieId=Movie.Id LEFT JOIN Orders ON Rental.OrderId =Orders.Id WHERE Customer.Id= #{id} AND Orders.ReturnDate IS NULL
SELECT Movie.name FROM MovieQ INNER JOIN Movie ON MovieQ.MovieId= Movie.Id WHERE AccountId=#{id}

SELECT Orders.DateTime , Orders.Id AS ORDER_ID , Movie.Name FROM Customer LEFT JOIN Account ON Customer.Id = Account.Customer LEFT JOIN Rental ON Account.ID = Rental.AccountId LEFT JOIN Movie ON Rental.MovieId = Movie.Id LEFT JOIN Orders ON Rental.OrderId= Orders.Id WHERE Customer.Id = #{id}
